rules_text:
[i](As an Arena enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it converted for free.)[/i]
When this battle enters, create a 1/1 white Cleric creature token with lifelink.
rules_text2: At the beginning of your end step, you may return target creature or battle card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text2:
[i]“We help support both the competitors and the spectators, all with the blessings of gods.”
—Ninda, Medical Cleric[/i]
